localization.examples.UKF¶

class localization.examples.UKF(x_dim=1, u_dim=0, z_dim=1, alpha=1, beta=2, kappa=1)¶

Bases: gaussian.UnscentedKalmanFilter

__init__(x_dim=1, u_dim=0, z_dim=1, alpha=1, beta=2, kappa=1)¶

Construct the Kalman filter by providing dimensions.

Parameters

  • x_dim (INT) – Length of the state vector. The default is 1. Used to create

  • u_dim (INT) – Length of the control input vector. The default is 0.

  • z_dim (INT) – Length of the measurement or observation vector. The default is 1.

Returns

The Kalman Filter object

Calculates the sigma points of the UKF based on current state estimate

Propagation or state transition function

h()¶

Measurement transformation function that maps the current state estimate to the measurement space

initialize(mu, Sigma)¶

Initializes the UKF about mu wiht covariance sigma and create sigma points

Parameters

  • mu (vector or vector-like) – mean of the distribution

  • Sigma (matrix or matrix-like) – covariances of the distribution

predict(u)¶

Runs the prediction or propagation phase of the UKF.

Parameters

u (vector or vector-like) – control input vector

set_control_input_matrix(B)¶

Used to set the control input matrix B.

Parameters

B (array or array-like) – the control input matrix

set_measurement_noise_matrix(R)¶

Sets the measurement noise matrix R

Parameters

R (array or array-like) – the measurement noise matrix R

set_process_noise_matrix(Q)¶

Sets the process noise matrix Q.

Parameters

Q (array or array-like) – the process noise matrix

set_state_transition_matrix(F)¶

Used to set the state transition matrix F.

Parameters

F (array or array-like) – the state transition matrix

step(u=None, z=None)¶

Executes one cycle of the Kalman Filter

Parameters

  • u (array or array-like) – the control input vector

  • z (array or array-like) – the measurement or observation vector

update(z)¶

Runs the update phase of the UKF

Parameters

z (vector or vector like) – measurement value
